title: Agfa-Gevaert Tournament (Germany)
text: The Agfa-Gevaert Tournament was a professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament that was played in <a href="Munich">Munich</a>, <a href="West%20Germany">West Germany</a> from 1968 to 1971. It was founded by sponsors <a href="Agfa-Gevaert">Agfa-Gevaert</a> following the success of their British subsidiary's <a href="Agfa-Gevaert%20Tournament">existing tournament</a> in England, and was the last of three tournaments in West Germany played in consecutive weeks, following on from the <a href="German%20Open%20%28golf%29">German Open</a> and the <a href="Woodlawn%20International%20Invitational">Woodlawn International Invitational</a>. It was hosted at Munich Golf Club.
